attributes.action: Scrap hospital parking fees for all staff.
attributes.additional_details: It is wholly unfair for staff working at hospitals who are doing vital, life saving work to be charged. They are already underpaid and it is ridiculous they should have to pay to attend their place of work.
attributes.background: Scrap all car park fees for all hospital staff.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Make parking for all NHS staff free all of the time: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307909

Abolish car parking charges for hospital employees and their sub-contractors: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/330751
